pageContext.associations: Part of a Bronze Founder's Hoard consisting of 16 socketed celts and 20 lumps of rough metal, also 14 pieces of socketed celts and 14 small pieces of an earthenware pot; 4 pieces of rim of burial urn, a pair of burial urn handles, 3 spearheads, 1 chape, and part of a socketed tool.
